desc: The smallest of the suites at KandB but by no means the least. The suite has views of both the Atlantic and the city of Lagos, minibar, a lounge for visitors, king sized beds, nespresso machines, Internet protocol TVs, bath tub and separate walk-in shower, complimentary internet and breakfast.
size: Spacious room equipped with working desk
